ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if ( and (MPM4_BASE__Deadline__c <> null, MPM4_BASE__Project__r.MPM4_BASE__Deadline__c <> null, MPM4_BASE__Deadline__c > MPM4_BASE__Project__r.MPM4_BASE__Deadline__c) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Deadline must be less than or equal to the project deadline.
